name: .REV File Extension
summary: Learn about .REV files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Recovery volume created with RAR file compression and archiving software; contains redundancy data that can be used to reconstruct missing files within a RAR volume set; only used with multi-volume archives.

content: NOTE: If the number of REV files is less than the number of corrupt of missing volumes, the volume set cannot be reconstructed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
